title: Why does my 4a go blank screen after starting a phone call?
content:
When placing or receiving a phone call my pixel 4A goes completely blank and does not revive while on a call. I cannot perform any other tasks while on a call. The only thing you can do is increase the volume or decrease the volume or hang up! I would always like to perform other tasks while communicating with somebody on the phone also turning on speakerphone is an important capability for a cell phone.

Very frustrating! Is there another option other than safe mode?

Thanks and regards,
